# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and the significant impact it could have on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11500. This represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your company's performance. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
